value.name: Two former patients allege they were sexually harassed by Lafayette chiropractor
value.description: Yet, on his office’s public Facebook page, we noted that Dr. Pucka was the subject of complaints about alleged inappropriate comments he allegedly made to female patients in numerous posts by individuals claiming to be his client.

value.name: Sadie Robertson reveals how birth of newborn daughter changed her perspective on body image
value.description: Sadie Robertson is just one week into being a first-time mom and she says her life has already been "changed." The "Duck Dynasty" alum shared an adorable black-and-white mirror selfie from her daughter Honey James' nursery and she's smiling from ear to ear ...

value.name: Sadie Robertson welcomes first child with husband Christian Huff: 'The pure goodness of God'
value.description: Sadie Robertson has welcomed a baby girl with her husband Christian Huff. The former "Duck Dynasty" star, 23, named her first child, Honey James. The exciting news was announced via Instagram on Wednesday. "We saw a million little miracles yesterday - the ...

value.name: Stars’ Jason Robertson named NHL rookie of the month after 18 points in April
value.description: Robertson was named the NHL’s rookie of the month for April after posting eight goals and 10 assists in 17 games. His 18 points were four more than Minnesota’s Kirill Kaprizov, Ottawa’s Josh ...
